title: Error message?
body:
Whats this about?

Obviously I'm connected to the internet (otherwise I wouldn't be able to post this)

I wasn't logging in either, i was in client already, just come out of a game.

Anyone know what the deal is?

replies.body: Riot have a worldwide connection issue, and have disabled ranked queues until it is fixed.

Maybe this has something to do with it? 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/katKn65c-connection-issues-245-pm-23rd-nov
